verses.text: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* Miktam \w of|strong="H4387"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w Preserve|strong="H8104"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w take|strong="H2620"\w* \w refuge|strong="H2620"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*; apart \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H1077"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w thing|strong="H2896"\w*.”

\w As|strong="H1992"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w saints|strong="H6918"\w* \w in|strong="H2656"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* excellence \w in|strong="H2656"\w* \w whom|strong="H1992"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w delight|strong="H2656"\w* resides.

\w Sorrows|strong="H6094"\w* \w will|strong="H8034"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* who chase \w other|strong="H8193"\w* gods. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H8034"\w* \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w pour|strong="H5258"\w* \w out|strong="H5258"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w libations|strong="H5262"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w or|strong="H8193"\w* \w speak|strong="H8193"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* chosen \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w*; You \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* secure.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w lines|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* boundary \w have|strong="H5307"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w pleasant|strong="H5273"\w* places; \w surely|strong="H5307"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w is|strong="H5159"\w* \w delightful|strong="H5273"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* counsels \w me|strong="H1288"\w*; \w even|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* conscience \w instructs|strong="H3256"\w* \w me|strong="H1288"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H7737"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w always|strong="H8548"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w me|strong="H5048"\w*. \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w shaken|strong="H4131"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w my|strong="H3651"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H3651"\w* tongue \w rejoices|strong="H8055"\w*; \w my|strong="H3651"\w* \w body|strong="H1320"\w* \w also|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* securely.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w abandon|strong="H5800"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* \w Holy|strong="H2623"\w* \w One|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w decay|strong="H7845"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* path \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*; \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3225"\w* \w fill|strong="H7648"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, \w with|strong="H6440"\w* eternal \w pleasures|strong="H5273"\w* \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*.
